alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Haakon; Jackson; Mellette; Northern Meade Co Plains; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued September 08 at 2:57AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...A cold front will move through the region today, with winds shifting northerly and increasing. Wind gusts over 40 mph can be expected behind the front. Minimum relative humidity will be 15 to 25 percent, lowest over southern SD. The combination of low RH and gusty winds will support critical fire weather conditions on much of the SD plains. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Friday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the moderate category.
